content:
@Mary Ann Boyle I was notified by @Michael van der Zel that he was unable to join this virtual meetup (https://whova.com/portal/webapp/keyco_202001/CommunityBoard/topic/270399/) via web app, since it brings you to the dead URL https://whova.com/portal/webapp/keyco_202001/CommunityBoard/topic/270399/gotomeet.me/DresdenMaxwell. He was able to join via the mobile app.
cc @Dresden Maxwell
Notice that when you just take the last part of the dead link, you will get there ;-)

I'm using the iPad version of the Whova app. More than half the screen is taken up by the "Ask a Question" section, leaving only the top part for the video. Is there a way to watch the video full screen?
I have: "Watch on Desktop", "X" to close the live stream, video icon to show video, "Leave Meeting", "Raise Hand", and "..." to Disconnect Audio. But no full screen option.

Hi @Harvard Pan , turning my Iphone on the side brings me to the full-screen setting. Probably this will work for the Ipad as well? Perhaps make sure the screen can be turned in the settings menu?

(I don't see a full screen option in the screen as well)
@Ardon Toonstra Thanks! It unfortunately doesn't turn into full screen on iPad, but does look better because of the aspect ratio.
